thread.title: Emmerdale spoilers: Faith Dingle reveals Emma’s killer secret after horror crash twist?
thread.title_full: Emmerdale spoilers: Faith Dingle reveals Emma’s killer secret after horror crash twist?

author: Duncan Lindsay
title: Emmerdale spoilers: Faith Dingle reveals Emma’s killer secret after horror crash twist?
text:
(Picture: ITV) Killer Emma Barton’s life has been turned upside down in Emmerdale as she has learned that Faith Dingle knows all about the fact that she murdered James. With Faith preparing to expose all, Emma headed to kill her with a rock – only to be struck down by Harriet Finch’s van. 
It looks like Emma is going to survive the horror crash as quick acting Cain, Harriet and Faith looked after her and called an ambulance. But while the ‘Jesus Forgives All’ message on the van that hit her gave Emma some comfort that all was going to be okay, Faith loomed over her on her stretcher and revealed that she found the rock Emma was going to hit her with.
(Picture: ITV) Snarling that she knew what Emma was and soon the whole village would, Faith sent terror up Emma’s spine – so is Faith about to reveal everything she knows about Emma’s crime and, after the debacle at the psychic night, will anyone believe her?
(Picture: ITV) We saw that Emma was prepared to put an end to Faith’s life in order to preserve her own secret – so could Faith be taking her life in her hands once more by crossing Emma again?
(Picture: ITV) Things are certainly messy for Emma right now and we all know what happens when she heads for the edge…
MORE: Emmerdale spoilers: ‘Explosive and dramatic’ end in store for Rakesh Kotecha 
MORE: Emmerdale spoilers: New trauma as Ashley Thomas goes missing – is this the end?
